revised_title: A Detailed Account of a Thunderstorm and Its Effects in Norwich
tldr: This article describes a thunderstorm that occurred in Norwich on July 13, 1758. It recounts the effects of lightning on a woman, who was injured, and the damage it caused to various parts of the house. The author also mentions the smell of sulfur after the storm, indicating the presence of brimstone matches.
